title: Telemetry Stream Metadata Schema (TSMS)
description: Defines expected parameters and required chronometric tolerances for all S-0x input streams consumed by the TSSM, informing HPTA behavior.

source_id.description: Unique cryptographic identifier of the generating component.

expected_frequency_hz.description: Nominal reporting frequency of the stream data.

latency_budget_ns.description: Maximum allowable synchronization offset (drift budget) in nanoseconds before logging a Chronometric Fidelity Warning (CFW). Critical streams should be <= 100.

trust_priority.description: A score (1-10, 10 being highest) indicating the stream's criticality to P-01 Trust Calculus.

failure_policy.description: Action to take if the stream repeatedly violates its latency_budget_ns threshold.
